title: (x) Desperate Housewives logo - Helvetica Ext, Bodoni {Jan E}
content:
Hello,  
Could U help me please to ID another fonts used in the Desperate Housewives Logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090417175136im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/desp_logo_5061.jpg)
  
Thank U,  
Caise
author: Caise

comments.content:
Helvetica Extended (Bold or Black)  
and Bodoni

Jan, thank You very much!!!

Bald Condensed, ;)
